handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=2;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #hortbot :!join
send_any
notify_channel_update hortbot

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!__roundtrip
send_match hortbot #foobar ^\[HB\] total=.*, handle=.*
